Inputs Interface¶

class epyk.interfaces.components.CompInputs.Inputs(context)¶
autocomplete(text='', placeholder='', width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', htmlCode=None, filter=None, options=None, attrs=None, profile=None)¶

Enables users to quickly find and select from a pre-populated list of values as they type, leveraging searching and filtering.

https://jqueryui.com/autocomplete/

d_search(text='', placeholder='', width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', htmlCode=None, filter=None, options=None, attrs=None, profile=None)¶

One of the new types of inputs in HTML5 is search

rptObj.ui.inputs.d_search(“”)

https://developer.mozilla.org/fr/docs/Web/HTML/Element/Input/search https://css-tricks.com/webkit-html5-search-inputs/
